headline: Trump picks Scott Bessent, the 'investor favorite,' for Treasury secretary
summary: President-elect Donald Trump has selected investor Scott Bessent as his nominee for Treasury secretary, putting forth a campaign trail partner and early frontrunner for the job after a long and contentious process.
